unnormalised: That's interesting! My Dadi swears by Ayurveda. She says a weekly massage with Mahanarayan oil is the secret to her long life. I tried a shirodhara treatment once in Kerala back in 2018 and it was so relaxing! Thinking of visiting Kottakkal Arya Vaidya Sala again maybe around October 26th this year. Anyone else tried any specific treatments? What time is best for an Abhyanga? Perhaps around 10:00 AM on, say, 1st December?
normalised: That is interesting! My Dadi swears by Ayurveda. She says a weekly massage with Mahanarayan oil is the secret to her long life. I tried a shirodhara treatment once in Kerala back in two thousand and eighteen and it was so relaxing! Perhaps around ten zero zero A M on, say, first December?
